title: Old emails displayed as new in unified inbox.
creator: qwantusx
content: Good day everyone. Have been an ignorant gmail user for years. Now, I am testing new grounds, and decided to move to more privacy focused email client. Only been using thunderbird for few weeks, but now it seems that my inbox is getting more confusing/confused that you would normally expect. Have not looked in too deep, but it seems that 10 year old emails appear as new in inbox. Say newest email is received on Sunday, and it says Sunday, but I was not expecting any email on Sunday, from that particular sender. So I looked ant the date and time, expecting it to be a spam, but this particular emais seems legit, however, the received date is Monday, 8 June, 2015. And that's not the first eMail from the past. I have got few more down in the inbox, like last week's, but they actually are from 2015. How is it even possible? I also have few new emails, so it's a real mishmash of new and old in the past few days. The only thing I can think of, is that I have changed the sync messages from (if I remember correctly) 6 months to anytime recently. Any ideas or hints?

title: Izvoz na mobilni uređaj sa laptopa koji je na Windows 11 na mobitel Samsung S25 ultra
creator: mrak1951
content: Ne mogu izvesti podatke iz Thunderbirda iz laptopa u mobitel
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/139.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android

title: Ažuriranje postavki servera
creator: mrak1951
content: Na Samsungovoj aplikaciji gmail sve radi normalno, ali na Thunderbirdu za androidu ne radi jer ne mogu napraviti izvoz podataka iz laptopa sa Thunderbirda na windows ima 11, jer moram ažurirati postavke servera koje su kao zastarjele.
